text: Pheri yadi patile tesro pataka talaka dincha bhane tyasapachi jabasam'ma ti svasni manisale kunai arko manisasamga vivaha nagarihalos. Pahilo patiko nimti svikarya humdaina. Ra yadi dosro patile pani (aphno icchale) talaka dincha bhane svasni ra usako pahilo patile punarvivaha garna sakdachan, yasama duvaimathi kunai gunaha chaina, yasa sartama ki duvaila'i visvasa hos ki allahaka simaharu kayama rakhna sakne chan. Yi allahaka simaharu hun, jasala'i usale janna cahane manisaharuko nimti varnana gardacha
